summary: Dynamic Sales Professional with over 7 years of success in B2B sales, account management, solution selling, and customer service. Proven ability in upselling, cross-selling, and technical support. Passionate about leveraging AI and technology to drive sales, enhance customer engagement, and deliver customer-driven solutions combining sales acumen with a tech-savvy approach.

workExperience.title: Account Executive
description: Drove B2B revenue growth through consultative upselling and cross-selling of technology products to upgrade client performance.
Provided high-quality inbound technical support, utilizing internal tools (potentially AI-powered) for proactive customer engagement and problem-solving.
Effectively cross-sold GoDaddy services to the existing client base.
Led team in highest dollar value of premium domain sales, demonstrating strong closing skills.

workExperience.title: Account Executive
description: Managed full-cycle B2B advertising sales; personally set up ad campaigns and CTAs for SMB clients, tailoring strategies to specific needs, optimizing performance, and increasing client retention.
Surpassed lifetime quota revenue by 105% through strategic planning, disciplined pipeline management, and identifying optimal touchpoints using industry trends and data.
Achieved recognition as a top team performer in 4 separate months by exceeding KPIs: 80+ daily calls, 2+ pitches per day, and maintained 2 hours of talk time.

Consistently exceeded monthly revenue targets, maintaining an average close rate near 40% on pitched accounts by utilizing strategic qualification questions and objection-handling techniques; achieved 159% (Sep '19), 156% (Oct '19), and 166% (Jan '20) of quota.

workExperience.title: Independent Sales Representative
description: Managed product supply using data forecasting tools for efficient inventory management, achieving a 10% increase in inventory accuracy and reducing waste.
Consistently met sales and shrink goals, reducing waste by 7% through strategic inventory management.
Implemented task-optimization strategies reducing labor costs by 20% and improving overall productivity.
Oversaw daily delivery logistics, product merchandising, and forecasted sales a week in advance.

workExperience.title: Independent Sales Representative
description: Increased yearly territory sales by over 18% through data-driven market analysis and targeted growth strategies.
Expanded total account base by 10% by identifying and pursuing new business opportunities.
Managed ordering, delivery, and merchandising processes, improving product availability.
Successfully executed all weekly product thresholds, maintaining consistent product availability and customer satisfaction.

projects.name: Al Sales Ninja
projects.description: Development of AI-powered sales assistant tool concept.

projects.name: Al for Candidates
projects.description: LLM wrapper proof-of-concept for candidate assessment.

interests: Keen interest in Al and emerging technologies
